data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 12 & iPad Air 2 - iOS 12.1 Public Beta 2
data.actual_result: You don't get an option to copy the ID.
data.expected_result: You should get the option to copy the ID of the voice channel and category.
data.short_description: Copy ID option missing for voice channels and categories
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Dev Mode is enabled - Go to a server - Long hold a voice channel and a category
